message: Command `git --no-pager -C django diff HEAD~1..HEAD db/models/sql/where.py > /workspace/diff.txt && sed -n '1,240p' /workspace/diff.txt` executed with exit code 0.
content:
diff --git a/django/db/models/sql/where.py b/django/db/models/sql/where.py
index aaab1730b7..bd11398d7e 100644
--- a/django/db/models/sql/where.py
+++ b/django/db/models/sql/where.py
@@ -129,13 +129,16 @@ class WhereNode(tree.Node):
             # Convert if the database doesn't support XOR:
             #   a XOR b XOR c XOR ...
             # to:
-            #   (a OR b OR c OR ...) AND (a + b + c + ...) == 1
+            #   (a OR b OR c OR ...) AND (a + b + c + ...) %% 2 == 1
             lhs = self.__class__(self.children, OR)
             rhs_sum = reduce(
                 operator.add,
                 (Case(When(c, then=1), default=0) for c in self.children),
             )
-            rhs = Exact(1, rhs_sum)
+            # Use modulo 2 of the sum to get parity (true when an odd number of
+            # arguments are true).
+            rhs_mod = rhs_sum % 2
+            rhs = Exact(1, rhs_mod)
             return self.__class__([lhs, rhs], AND, self.negated).as_sql(
                 compiler, connection
             )

extras.command: git --no-pager -C django diff HEAD~1..HEAD db/models/sql/where.py > /workspace/diff.txt && sed -n '1,240p' /workspace/diff.txt
